text: Fellow Julians, what are some of the platforms you know, which allow Julia for competitive coding?

elements.text: Fellow Julians, what are some of the platforms you know, which allow Julia for competitive coding?

btw I think these question might benefit others and are likely long lasting so better for forum imo

attachments.title: Coding Challenges websites for Julia
attachments.text: I love solving programming challenges, but many programming sites don’t support Julia and I’ve been emailing them to ask for support Julia for a while. These are some websites I found to be good for Julia With correctness verifier HackerRank - native Julia support, however, many example code still use STDIN where stdin would be valid. But it’s the best so far. Also, not every problem supports Julia. If you come across a problem that doesn’t support Julia, commenting on the discussion board s...
attachments.fallback: JuliaLang: Coding Challenges websites for Julia
